ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent creation of CQI assessment records, if the current user is not case owner's manager or QAA user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED ( Assessment_Score__c ) ), $User.Id <> Agent_Name__r.ManagerId , $User.Id <> Agent_Name__r.CQI_Coach_User__c , OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'KPI_Assessment' , RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Call_Quality_Assessment' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CQI Assessments can be created only by case owner's active primary manager or assigned QAA agent.
